about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Baron Bot is a League of Legends Discord bot. It tries to offer the most accurate information, in the shortest time possible. The bot's objective is to eliminate the effort to open third party websites to get crucial information.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: If you want to contact the developer, submit a bug, suggest a feature, or simply just talk about how Teemo should be deleted from the game, join the bots server or add Phyxsius#1238.

footer.text:
All rights reserved. Website and bot were made with ‚ù§ by Phyxsius.
Avatar made by TMiracle.

commandsDesc.add-remove: Add/Remove your LoL summoner to your account.
commandsDesc.champion: Everything you need to know about a champion: Builds, runes, spells, etc.
commandsDesc.disable-enable: Disables Baron Bot on a channel. / Enables Baron Bot back on a channel.
commandsDesc.invite: Get the bot's invite link to add it to your server.
commandsDesc.language: Check available languages and change the bot's laguange.
commandsDesc.lastplayed: Shows when a player last played a specified champion.
commandsDesc.live: Live game informations: Ranks, winrate, etc.
commandsDesc.mastery: List of champions with most mastery points by a summoner.
commandsDesc.profile: Summoner profile with ranks, champions, last game, etc.
commandsDesc.skins: Lists champions skins or displays detailed info for a certain skin along with their prices.
commandsDesc.streams: Lists current livestreams for the given champion.
commandsDesc.synergy: Best champions that the specified champion synergizes with.
commandsDesc.tips: Tips to play with and against a champion.
commandsDesc.topplayers: Players with the most mastery points all over the world on given champion.
commandsDesc.ultimatebravery: Random summoners, build, skill path, etc.
commandsDesc.playlists: Customized playlists for the chosen play style.
